resources.string: Error while building set , please try again
Press on one of the dice on the right side to roll that die\nThe result will appear on the left side

Press on the plus button on the bottom left corner
 You will be asked to give the set a name
 The right side will be expanded to show you the list of rolls you can add to the set
 You can add how many times each die will be rolled by altering the number next to it
 Next to the MOD label you can add a modifier to be added to the end of your roll
 When you are finished press the save icon on the bottom left and the set will appear on the bottom side of your screen

To edit an existing set long press on the set's name
 If you did it correctly the set's name will light up and the editing panel will expand
 You can then alter the set and save the set using the save button on the lower left side
 Or delete the set by using the delete button next to he save button
